name: Abhijeet Katte
about: Abhijeet founder and CEO of Parva, is a gifted data Scientist who led the development of one of India's fastest growing hackathon platforms MachineHack.com, and has worked on data science problems across domains.

name: Amal Nair
about: Amal is a talented software engineer and a data scientist who was part of the development team of one of the leading ML hackathon platforms in India.

name: Renjil T
about: Renjil, Parva's co-founder helped launch 92.7 FM in India and headed large sales efforts for the India Today Group and The Indian Express.

name: Prajakta Hebbar
about: Prajakta is a noted journalist with 10+ years of experience with news organisations like Huffpost India, CNN-IBN and The Indian Express.

name: Manali Sapate
about: Manali is an IISc-trained scientist with an alternate career in space technology.

name: Suvrat Joshi
about: Suvrat is a National School Of Drama-trained actor who is the creative force behind one of India's best modern theatre plays.

name: Thirunarayan Simha
about: Thirunarayan Simhan is a BBA marketing graduate with a diploma in digital marketing.

name: Rohan Nerlekar
about: Rohan Nerlekar is an experienced founder with a demonstrated history of working in the consumer electronics industry. Skilled in Brand Management, Project Management, and Digital Marketing. A strong business development professional with a PGDM focused in Rural Management from Welingkar Institute of Management and hobbyist photographer.

name: Pushkar Paranjpe
about: Pushkar was previously an academic researcher in modern experimental biology. Extentive experience in the industry in applying data science principles to real world problems. Takes keen interest in startups, tech products and communities.
